text: Bel-Air-Val-d'Ance is a commune in the Lozère department in southern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Chambon-le-Château (the seat) and Saint-Symphorien.Arrêté préfectoral 28 September 2018, p. 131 ==See also== *Communes of the Lozère department ==References== * INSEE commune file Belairvaldance Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Bel-Air-Val-d'Ance
